list.name: Storybook Playground
list.description: This app was created with the goal to have examples of ours React components, hooks and libraries that are created in different packages in the repository Nancy.js.

list.name: @nanlabs/react-hooks
list.description: This package contains different React hooks that can be used in different projects.

list.name: @nanlabs/react-ui
list.description: This library provides a set of React components that can be used in any React application

list.name: @nanlabs/react-thirdparty
list.description: This library provides a set of React components that can be used in any React application. It provides integrations with third party libraries like Google ReCaptcha and more!

list.name: @nanlabs/thirdparty
list.description: This library provides a set of tools that can be used in any web application. It provides integrations with third party libraries like Google ReCaptcha and more!

list.name: @nanlabs/fp
list.description: This library provides a set of tools to help you write functional code in TypeScript. It includes tools for type guards, error handling, and more!

list.name: @nanlabs/eslint-config
list.description: This eslint config is used in our projects to enforce a consistent code style.

list.name: @nanlabs/eslint-config-ts
list.description: This eslint config is used in our projects to enforce a consistent code style for TypeScript projects.

list.name: @nanlabs/eslint-config-react
list.description: This eslint config is used in our projects to enforce a consistent code style for React projects.

list.name: @nanlabs/eslint-config-next
list.description: This eslint config is used in our projects to enforce a consistent code style for Next.js projects.

list.name: React Boilerplate
list.description: A simple but powerful boilerplate to start a React project powered by Vite. Boilerplate generated using [create-awesome-node-app](https://www.npmjs.com/package/create-awesome-node-app) contains full CI/CD setup with GitHub Actions and Docker. It also contains a full local development setup with hot reload and production ready setup with minification and optimization. It also contains a full test setup with Jest and React Testing Library.

list.name: TypeScript Monorepo Boilerplate
list.description: A simple but powerful boilerplate to start a TypeScript monorepo project powered Turborepo.

list.name: Supercharge Your Website with Core Web Vitals
list.description: Learn how to optimize your website's performance and improve SEO using Core Web Vitals. Discover the key metrics, tools, and techniques to deliver an exceptional user experience.
tags: Examples > Frontend > Website Optimization and Performance

list.name: Comparative Analysis between styled-components and Tailwind CSS
list.description: Article that presents a comparative analysis of styled-components and Tailwind CSS, focusing on practical implementations of a UI Challenge using both libraries.

list.name: React Security Best Practices Guide
list.description: This checklist provides React security best practices to assist you and your team in identifying and addressing security issues within your React applications. Additionally, it includes guidance on how to automate security testing for your React code and automatically remedy any security-related issues.
